lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin, the second pick in the 2004 N.H.L. draft, will be out indefinitely after dislocating his left shoulder in his first game with the Pittsburgh Penguins, the team said yesterday. Malkin, who signed with Pittsburgh earlier this month after leaving his Russian Super League club, collided with his teammate John LeClair in a preseason game Wednesday against Philadelphia.
